name: Animals_Go
description:
【COOL FEATURES】
- Beautiful and simple gameplay, easy to play and addictive!
- Unlock a variety of cute animals, free to replace different decorations!
- Golden Mode lets you experience the thrill that the gold is spread everywhere!
- Multiple challenges, progress step by step, chasing for high scores!

【New Features】
* Chest reward system optimization and rocket improvements.
* Guidance system adjustments.
* Added more characters with superpower
* Go Spin the hidden lucky wheel to get more fun!
* Watch out the added random surprise!

Invite your friends! Who can jump the highest in AnimalsGo?

We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
